text: Hontoni shinko o kyohi shita mono,(hitobito o) arra no michi kara samatageru mono, soko (makka) no kyoju-shadearou to, gairai-shadearou to subete, ware ga hitobito no tame ni konryu shita seinaru masujido (ni hairu koto) o kyohi suru mono, soshite sono Chu de shinsei o yogoshi fugi o takuramu mono ni wa, ware wa itamashi chobatsu o aji wa serudearou
